description: Kristin was last seen with Paul Flores near his dorm.
Declared dead on the 6th anniversary of her disappearance.
Sheriff's Office and FBI dug on Cal Poly hillside.
Cadaver dogs and GPR used under the deck.
Paul charged with Murder, Ruben charged with Accessory.
Trial started in Monterey County after venue change.
Paul Flores found Guilty of First-Degree Murder.
